name: Column Taker
description:
Welcome to the world of Column Taker!
In this game you are to take the columns ( the beams in the middle) out of a high-rise building!
You take turns taking a peice out at a time until someone knocks over the building!! Whoever knocked ofver the building, loses...
You can take the beams by touching and dragging them.
The buildings are see-through so you can see inside the building to get the columns.
There is a touch pad on the lower right-hand corner of the screen so you can rotate the view around the building!!
--Nathan
